actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend section 1562 of title 38, United States Code, to increase the amount of Medal of Honor Roll special pension, to provide for an annual adjustment in the amount of that special pension, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Increases from $600 to $1,000 the monthly special pension for individuals entered on the Army, Navy, Air Force, and Coast Guard Medal of Honor Roll. Directs the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to increase such amount by the same percentage that benefit amounts under title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act are increased each year after 2001.
